com.aloqa.trax.client.saps
Interface ConnectionControl

public interface ConnectionControl

Use this interface to control the connection to the Aloqa server. Note that the positions of other users can only be accessed, if there is a connection to the server.

Method Summary
 void startConnecting(ConnectionParameters p)
          Starts a connection to the Aloqa server.
 void stopConnection()
          Closes an open connection to the Aloqa server, if there is one, and stops trying to reconnect.
 

Method Detail

startConnecting

void startConnecting(ConnectionParameters p)
Starts a connection to the Aloqa server. Whenever a disconnection with the server occurs, it will be tried to reconnect after a certain time-out specified by the Aloqa server.

Parameters:
p - The ConnectionParameters for this connection.

stopConnection

void stopConnection()
Closes an open connection to the Aloqa server, if there is one, and stops trying to reconnect.
